attachments.title: Don’t add your 2 cents | Derek Sivers
attachments.text: My friend Simone in Korea just became the big boss at work, managing other people for the first time.
attachments.fallback: Don’t add your 2 cents | Derek Sivers

text: hehe, that's a good advice, I once had a project with a bug corporation and there was many managers checking it... each wanted to add something :smile:
